title: China to promote sci-tech cooperation on basis of IPR protection: premier
content:
Photo taken on Jan. 6, 2021 shows the high-speed Electric Multiple Unit (EMU) named Fuxing in China Railway Beijing Group Co., Ltd. in Beijing, capital of China. 
BEIJING, March 11 (Xinhua) -- China is ready to enhance cooperation in science and technology with other countries on the basis of intellectual property rights (IPR) protection, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang said Thursday.
